name.ja: <ruby>重騎兵<rt>センチュリオン</rt></ruby>エメト<ruby>Ⅵ<rt>ゼクス</rt></ruby>

text.en: During your opponent's turn, if this card is in your hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Centurion" monster you control, except "Centurion Emet VI"; place it face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Trap, and if you do, Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon "Centurion Emet VI" for the rest of this turn. During the Main Phase, while this card is treated as a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Centurion Emet VI" once per turn.
